posts.post_content: So who wants to help me finish this off?  I need this final card after making a nice deal with member sarahsdad and need this to finish the 10-card bb set.  Looking for lower grade with writing, trimming, holes, rips or paper loss except very minor to the back.  I've tried to focus on clean white backgrounds.  PM or email to [url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url].  Thanks for looking.
